meanings.definition: A person who signs a document.
meanings.sent1: The signatories on the contract were happy with the terms.
meanings.sent2: All the signatories agreed to the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The signatories on the will were relieved to finally have it settled.
meanings.sent4: The signatories to the treaty brought peace to the land.
meanings.sent5: The signatories proudly put their names on the important document.

meanings.definition: A party that has signed an agreement.
meanings.sent1: The signatories of the treaty celebrated the successful negotiation.
meanings.sent2: Both signatories of the contract fulfilled their obligations.
meanings.sent3: The signatories at the meeting were excited to see the results of their collaboration.
meanings.sent4: The signatories to the deal shook hands in agreement.
meanings.sent5: The signatories proudly displayed the signed document for all to see.
